column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Raspberry macarons FTW! I brought my little nieces here and they loved it! Parking sucks
column2: but it's worth fighting your way in the cramped lot to get some lovely desserts. It's pretty pricey here but that just ensures I don't overindulge. I wish Dallas had more places like this. Just another reason why Houston is better than Dallas...
